name: Hippoo!
author: Hippoo team

sections.description:
Hippoo WooCommerce Plugin – Streamline Your Shop Management

The Hippoo WooCommerce Plugin is a powerful extension that enhances the functionality of your WooCommerce shop. Seamlessly integrate your shop with the Hippoo Android app to unlock advanced features, including the creation of out-of-stock lists, adding images to order products via API, and user authentication for optimal app utilization. Take control of your shop’s inventory, order fulfillment, and customer engagement with ease.

Key Features:

  1. Out-of-Stock List: Keep track of products that are out of stock directly from your WooCommerce shop. Stay informed and take proactive measures to restock inventory, ensuring seamless customer experiences.
  2. Order Product Image API: Enhance order management by adding product images to the order details via API. Provide visual references for streamlined fulfillment and improved customer satisfaction.
  3. User Authentication: Authenticate users seamlessly to unlock the full potential of the Hippoo Android app. Enjoy secure access to order fulfillment, inventory management, and other advanced features.

To install the Hippoo Android app on your phone:

  1. Visit the Google Play Store using the following link: Hippoo Android App.
  2. Click on the “Install” button to download and install the Hippoo app on your Android device.
  3. Open the Hippoo app and follow the on-screen instructions to authenticate your shop and start utilizing the advanced features.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
    3- Install Hippoo! Android App from Google Play
sections.changelog:
• 1.3.4 Add weight to order object
  • 1.3.3 – Fix config UI and minor changes
  • 1.3.2 – Handle remote json fetch failure
  • Add product images to orders
  • Add out-of-stock API
  • Hippoo app auth
sections.screenshots:
1. Hippoo main dashboard in the app

  2. Orders management in the app

  3. Product list and inventory management

  4. Edit product page

  5. Latest out-of-stock list

  6. Create and edit coupons

  7. Change order status by scanning order id on shipments
sections.reviews:
Nice plugin & app to manage woocommerce

By pvnanini on March 9, 2024

Nice plugin & app to manage woocommerce stores without jetpack
